tasks.instruction:
Analyze the Routix Platform requirements and create a comprehensive Product Requirements Document (PRD). Focus on:
1. Market research for AI thumbnail generation platforms
2. Competitive analysis of similar tools
3. User personas (YouTubers, content creators, agencies)
4. Feature prioritization and roadmap
5. Business model validation
6. Technical feasibility assessment
The project brief is located at: /workspace/uploads/Master Project Prompt - Routix Platform.pdf
Key features to analyze: Chat-based UI, AI thumbnail generation using template matching, multi-algorithm system ("Routix Versions"), admin panel, real-time progress tracking, credit system.

Design the complete system architecture for Routix Platform based on Emma's PRD. Create detailed technical specifications covering:
1. Backend architecture (FastAPI, PostgreSQL with pgvector, Redis, Celery)
2. Frontend architecture (Next.js 14, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS)
3. AI services integration (Gemini Vision, OpenAI, Midjourney API)
4. Database schema design with vector embeddings
5. API contracts and integration points
6. Real-time communication strategy (WebSocket/SSE)
7. Security and authentication flow (JWT)
8. Scalability considerations
9. Template analysis pipeline design
10. Chat system architecture
Save the system design document to: /workspace/docs/design/system_architecture.md
